text: 5.16.2 Recoverable Schedule A schedule(s) is recoverable if and only if (I) No uncommitted read (no dirty ready in schedule(s). Or (II) If transaction Tj reads data item ‘x’ which is updated by transaction ‘Ty’, then commit of Tj must be delayed until commit/rollback of Ti. Tl TJ W(x) E : R(x) «—— Dirty Read Commit/Roll back : Commit
